LanguageData.SK_WeaponMastery_ModSettingsSectionNote: (Certain changes require a restart in order to take effect)
LanguageData.SK_WeaponMastery_ModSettingsSectionWeapo: Chance for weapon to be renamed:
On gaining the first mastery level, there's a chance for pawns to rename their weapon
LanguageData.SK_WeaponMastery_ModSettingsSectionRoyal: This configuration option requires Royalty DLC
LanguageData.SK_WeaponMastery_ModSettingsSectionIdeol: This configuration option requires Ideology DLC
LanguageData.SK_WeaponMastery_ModSettingsSectionRelic: Number of bonus stats for relic:
Bonuses only apply to pawns that believe in the relic's ideology
LanguageData.SK_WeaponMastery_ModSettingsSectionSpeci: A pawn mastering an assault rifle will not master ALL assault rifles but only THE assault rifle that is in their possession
LanguageData.SK_WeaponMastery_ModSettingsSectionGener: A pawn mastering an assault rifle will master ALL assault rifles NOT only the assault rifle that is in their possession
LanguageData.SK_WeaponMastery_ModSettingsSectionMaste: Allow masteries to spawn on pawns coming from outside your colony. Such as raids, visitors and traders.
LanguageData.SK_WeaponMastery_ModSettingsSectionDispl: Display experience needed to level up for each weapon in the info tab
LanguageData.SK_WeaponMastery_ModSettingsSectionMaste: Percentage of pawns that should spawn with a mastery from a group
LanguageData.SK_WeaponMastery_ModSettingsUseMoodsChec: When equipping a mastered weapon, pawn gains a mood bonus and vice versa (Specific Weapon Mastery Only)
LanguageData.SK_WeaponMastery_LevelSectionDetail: Add or remove mastery levels up to a max of 15 levels. Each time a pawn levels up, they will get a random stat bonus.
LanguageData.SK_WeaponMastery_RangedAndMeleeStatsSect: Warning: Only certain stat defs are applicable to weapons and pawns, the rest are just ignored. If you don't know what you're doing, I would highly recommend not editing anything in this section.
Note: Percentage stats use values from 0 -> 1 which maps to 0% -> 100%
